scripts.e2e-tests_local_base: cypress run --env type=base failSilently=false onGithubActions=false --config screenshotsFolder=cypress/snapshots/base --headed --browser chrome --spec cypress/specs/10-ClientPortalAccountDashboard-spec.js
scripts.e2e-tests_local: cypress run --env type=actual failSilently=false onGithubActions=false --record false --config screenshotsFolder=cypress/snapshots/actual --headed --browser chrome --spec cypress/specs/10-ClientPortalAccountDashboard-spec.js
scripts.headlessTests: npm run clearReport && cypress run --headless --browser chrome --spec cypress/specs/1-createIndividualAccount-spec.js
scripts.allTests: npm run clearReport && cypress run --browser chrome --spec cypress/specs/*spec.js
scripts.allTestsAndReport: npm run allTests && npm run openReport
scripts.parallelTests: npm run clearReport && cypress-parallel -s allTests -t 2 -d cypress/specs
scripts.parallelTestsAndReport: npm run parallelTests && npm run openReport
